reviewText:
Bought it because I didn't want my kid watching a lot of cartoons and thought this would have natural scenes , turns some small clips where taken at zoos , the letters in the sing along look horrible on my 52 inch , the songs are annoying and lame , the commentary and scenes are boring my son wasn't interested at all  although he liked animals.

The "I know" series are all the same Ive got these in addition to this mistake I'm currently reviewing

http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B003Y7DNJQ/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_1
http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B006TSI7A2/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_2

I made a mistake so you don't have to

My son loves animals so this is a wonderful learning tool for him.  He stays focused on programs that include our wonderful creatures and this is helping to reinforce what we are teaching him! He's 23 months and doing great!!!
